abstract: Unnamed man kills eight people in Uhersky Brod, Czech Republic, restaurant after telling Prima TV reporter Pavel Lebduska that since he was being bullied and authorities were unresponsive he would take matters into his own hands.
lead_paragraph: The gunman, who was described by officials as mentally unstable, opened fire inside the restaurant in the town of Uhersky Brod, in the southeastern region of the Czech Republic.

headline.main: Czech Gunman Kills 8 People and Then Himself at Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Nine Die in Rampage

snippet: The gunman, who was described by officials as mentally unstable, opened fire inside the restaurant in the town of Uhersky Brod, in the southeastern region of the Czech Republic.
